nodes.text: The N4-SW Runner was a type of small battle droid available during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

The N4-SW Runner appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a pet. It was a reward for players of the game Need for Speed World as part of the cross-promotion between Electronic Arts's free-to-play games; players of Need for Speed World who created an account in The Old Republic by April 1, 2013 received the pet.
